components.name: Dual Audience Feature Cards
components.description: Two-column card layout showcasing different target audiences with labels, titles, descriptions, and icons
components.styleNotes: Clean audience-targeting cards - excellent for platforms serving multiple user types.

components.name: Feature Section with Image
components.description: Two-column feature section with image and content
components.styleNotes: Standard split layout with image left, content right. Works well with all themes.

components.name: Feature Grid with Icons
components.description: 2x2 grid feature showcase with header, icons, titles, and descriptions
components.styleNotes: Clean 2x2 grid with centered header and icon placeholders.

components.name: Comprehensive Feature Showcase
components.description: Multi-section layout with header, benefit highlights, and split content with logo display
components.styleNotes: Comprehensive multi-section layout with inline benefits and prominent branding.

components.name: Feature Grid with Header and CTA
components.description: Feature section with descriptive header, call-to-action, and 2x2 grid of feature cards
components.styleNotes: Professional layout with header section, CTA button, and organized feature grid.

components.name: Alternative Feature Grid Layout
components.description: Variation of feature grid with different styling approach - similar to feature72 with alternative visual treatment
components.styleNotes: Alternative styling to feature72 - provides different visual treatment with similar functionality.

components.name: Why Work With Us Benefits Grid
components.description: Benefits showcase with centered title and 2x3 grid of benefit categories with icons and descriptions
components.styleNotes: Benefits-focused 2x3 grid layout - excellent for showcasing company advantages.

components.name: Core Features Grid
components.description: Core features section with left-aligned title and 2x3 grid of feature items with icons and descriptions
components.styleNotes: Clean 2x3 grid with left-aligned title - ideal for core product capabilities.

components.name: Split Hero Feature
components.description: Two-column layout with content left, visual right - includes title, description, CTA button, and card/visual element
components.styleNotes: Standard split layout - content left, visual right. Good for most feature presentations.

components.name: Expandable Feature List
components.description: Split layout with expandable/accordion feature list on left and visual on right - includes collapsible sections
components.styleNotes: Interactive accordion-style feature list - great for detailed feature explanations.

components.name: Alternating Feature Layout
components.description: Header section with CTA followed by alternating left-right feature items with icons and descriptions
components.styleNotes: Alternating feature layout with header CTA - great for detailed feature walkthroughs.

components.name: Three-Step Process Layout
components.description: Process showcase with three step cards at top and large central visual element below
components.styleNotes: Clean three-step process layout with prominent central visual - great for workflow explanations.

components.name: Values and Principles Layout
components.description: Split layout with title section on left and 2x2 grid of values/principles with descriptions on right
components.styleNotes: Clean values showcase with split layout - perfect for company values and principles sections.

components.name: Feature Grid Cards
components.description: Centered title with 3x2 grid of feature cards containing icons, titles, and descriptions
components.styleNotes: Clean 3x2 card grid with centered header - great for comprehensive feature showcases.

components.name: Three-Column Feature Showcase
components.description: Clean three-column layout showcasing core features with icons and descriptions
components.styleNotes: Simple grid layout with consistent spacing and typography

components.name: Unique Value Proposition Grid
components.description: Centered header with 2x2 grid showcasing unique company values and differentiators
components.styleNotes: Clean 2x2 grid layout with centered header - perfect for highlighting what makes you unique
